title: IGP Tajender Singh Luthra takes charge as first DGP of Chandigarh | punjab$chandigarh | Hindustan Times
text:
IGP Tajender Singh Luthra takes charge as first DGP of Chandigarh punjab Updated: Feb 21, 2017 15:02 IST Hindustan Times, Chandigarh Tajender Singh Luthra.(HTâ€‰Photo) 
Tajender Singh Luthra, inspector general of police, UT, has been promoted as the first director general of police, Chandigarh. 
This is the first time that the city police force gets a DG as the department has always been led by an IG-rank officer, previously. 
Punjab governor and UT administrator VP Singh Badnore along with adviser Parimal Rai decorated the officer with stars of a DGP on Monday. Luthra, a 1990 batch AGMUT cadre officer, was appointed the Chandigarh IGP in February 2016. tags
